name: Repeated Kafka authentication failures
description: Checks for Event Stream authentication failures

fields.name: content
fields.value:
1. Verify your user credentials and ensure they are correct.
 2. Check if there is an active authentication ticket in your environment. If yes, clear it by running the appropriate command.
 3. If the problem persists, consider regenerating your API key and secret.
 4. If none of these steps work, contact IBM Support for further assistance.

For more information on how to regenerate your API key and secret, refer to the [official documentation](https://cloud.ibm.com/docs/event-streams?topic=event-streams-apikey).
